overview: Prabhu(Balakrishna Kola) is an average looking middle class IT employee who wants to experience true love. He keeps trying hard but to his bad luck, he gets rejected because of his looks. On the other hand, Manoja(Wamiqa Gabbi) is an urban girl who does not want to get married because of her troubled past. As her motherâ€™s health starts deteriorating, she is forced into an arranged marriage with Prabhu.
title: Nannu Vadili Neevu Polevule
